package.name: motoman_gp110_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman GP110 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman GP110 series of manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online documentation files for the robot (CAD model GP110_SP100_3D.zip and drawing datasheet HW1385705.01 from here). All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Christian Juelg
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
